definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
abbr. for Macao 澳門|澳门/abbr. for Australia 澳大利亞|澳大利亚
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

pinyin: Xi1 ao4 da4 li4 ya4 zhou1

sentences.english: Davila, who lives near the mining boom town of Perth, in Western Australia.
sentences.chinese: 戴維拉居住在西澳大利亞繁榮的礦業城市珀斯附近。

sentences.english: More good news comes from computer modellers at the University of Western Australia, Crawley.
sentences.chinese: 克羅裏，西澳大利亞大學計算機模擬得到許多好消息。

sentences.english: Perth is the capital of Western Australia and is surrounded by spectacular nature.
sentences.chinese: 珀斯是西澳大利亞州的首府，風景秀麗，氣候宜人。

sentences.english: Consequently, Western Australian remained part of the Commonwealth.
sentences.chinese: 因此，西澳大利亞州仍然是澳大利亞聯邦的一個洲。

sentences.english: Perth is the capital of Western Australia and has one of the most striking skylines anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 柏斯乃澳洲西部的門戶，它是西澳大利亞洲的首府。
